name: guide-bot
description: This project includes a bunch of guides to create a bot with **[discord.js](https://discord.js.org/)** and a template code in the [`src`](src) directory.

scripts.html: npx prettier --write guides && rm pages/*.html && cd html-pages && npm ci && npm start && cd .. && npx prettier --write pages
scripts.commit: git add . && git config user.name "${GITHUB_ACTOR}" && git config user.email "${GITHUB_ACTOR}@users.noreply.github.com" && git commit -m "chore: deploy pages and lint source" || true && git push

author: DTrombett
